Question: Poyang Huakai Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Poyang Huakai Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd.

6-IN-1 SD CARD STD SMT TYPE

- Manufactures 6-IN-1 SD card standard SMT type connectors
- Specializes in manufacturing plastic and hardware products, computer connectors, cables, and ancillary equipment
- ISO9001/ISO14001 certified, emphasizing excellent quality, large quantity, and low prices

HDMI AF 90° REV DIP Type CH-1.32mm

- Produces HDMI AF 90° reverse dual in-line package (DIP) type CH-1.32mm connectors
- Operates a modern top-tier factory covering 6,000m2 land area, employing over 200 people
- Aims to improve manufacturing facilities to provide better quality products
